prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with a tough exterior and drill-like features.
Imagine a Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a steel-like shell.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines earth and metal elements in its design.
Make a Pokemon that is adept at digging with sharp claws and a strong build.
Generate a creature that thrives in caves with a formidable appearance and powerful abilities.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek body and metallic accents, perfect for underground battles.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a rugged, earthy look.
